message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for $18,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your offer, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you do $15,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
